custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT MBCategory.categoryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM MBCategory INNER JOIN Subscription ON (Subscription.classNameId = ?) AND (Subscription.classPK = MBCategory.categoryId) WHERE (MBCategory.groupId = ?) AND (Subscription.userId = ?)

SELECT DISTINCT {MBCategory.*} FROM MBCategory INNER JOIN Subscription ON (Subscription.classNameId = ?) AND (Subscription.classPK = MBCategory.categoryId) WHERE (MBCategory.groupId = ?) AND (Subscription.userId = ?) ORDER BY MBCategory.lastPostDate DESC
